snippet: The construction of a courthouse in Fredericksburg, Va., had the unexpected effect of exposing an almost perfectly preserved scene from a ferocious 1862 battle.
abstract: Discovery of almost perfectly preserved cellar containing artifacts from Civil War under construction site in Fredericksburg, Va, has astonished archaeologists due to its pristine state.
lead_paragraph: The construction of a courthouse in Fredericksburg, Va., had the unexpected effect of exposing an almost perfectly preserved scene from a ferocious 1862 battle.

headline.main: Construction Site Offers Fleeting Glimpse of the Civil War Past
headline.print_headline: Construction Site Offers Fleeting Glimpse of the Civil War Past
